mechanisms driving the FM state and the number of necessary QLs are not understood,and the
surface magnetism remains obscure. Here, we demonstrate robust FM properties in MnBi6Te10
and establish their origin in the Mn/Bi intermixing phenomenon by
a combined experimental and theoretical study. Our measurements reveal a magnetically intact
surface with alarge magnetic moment,and with FM properties similarto the bulk.Our investigation
